/usr/bin/c++   -g -o0 -std=c++0x  -ffast-math -Wall    CMakeFiles/bm3d_gpu.dir/timeutil.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bm3d_gpu.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bm3d_gpu.dir/utilities.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bm3d_gpu.dir/mt19937ar.c.o CMakeFiles/bm3d_gpu.dir/io_png.c.o CMakeFiles/bm3d_gpu.dir/./bm3d_gpu_generated_bm3d.cu.o  -o bm3d_gpu -rdynamic /usr/local/cuda-7.0/lib64/libcudart.so -lpng /usr/local/cuda-7.0/lib64/libcufft.so -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda-7.0/lib64
